snippet: A death row inmate who prosecutors say recruited her son in a plot to kill her husband will get a new trial, the Mississippi Supreme Court ruled Monday.
abstract: Mississippi Supreme Court orders new trial for death row inmate Michelle Byrom, who prosecutors say recruited her son in a plot to kill her husband.
lead_paragraph: A death row inmate who prosecutors say recruited her son in a plot to kill her husband will get a new trial, the Mississippi Supreme Court ruled Monday.

headline.main: Mississippi: Condemned Woman Gets New Trial
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Condemned Woman Gets New Trial
